oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Traditional use of herbs for treatment of farm animals by organic farmers in three Swiss cantons
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Walkenhorst, M.
Hamburger, M.
Ivemeyer, S.
Schmid, K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Little is known about the usage of traditional herbs in the treatment of farm animals in central Europe, with exception of Austria.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Walkenhorst, M.; Hamburger, M.; Ivemeyer, S. and Schmid, K. (2011) Traditional use of herbs for treatment of farm animals by organic farmers in three Swiss cantons. In: Herbal Product in Animal Health and Nutrition - Book of Abstracts.
